title: NEW GAME MODE: Black Market Brawlers Gameplay Montage w/ Commentary

embed.description: Black Market Brawlers: Purchase illegal Black Market items and use golden Krakens to recruit new brawler minions as you vie for dominance on Summoner's Rift! Read all about it here: http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/PoXwnKtl-black-market-brawlers-featured-game-mode-live-soon-on-pbe ********************************************** Twitter: https://twitter.com/aFluxx ********************************************** Play League of Legends for free: http://www.leagueoflegends.com ********************************************** Music: K.Safo & Alex Skrindo - Future Vibes (feat.

body:
Black Market Brawlers:
Purchase illegal Black Market items and use golden Krakens to recruit new brawler minions as you vie for dominance on Summoner’s Rift!


Read all about it here:

http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/PoXwnKtl-black-market-brawlers-featured-game-mode-live-soon-on-pbe

**********************************************
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aFluxx
**********************************************
Play League of Legends for free: http://www.leagueoflegends.com
